content: the fairy glen socks are a fun easy sock pattern with addictive repeats the color and stitch changes will make you want to knit just a little more to get to the next section with an easy afterthought heel construction the knitting will feel like it is flowing **naturally dyed kits dyed by me are available on my website 1 ** 1 https //www thenoblethread com/product-page/fairy-glen-sock-kit
